titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious letter to the Privy Council of Scotland, for adjourning the Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: At end: Given at our court at Kensigtoun, the twentieth day of March, 1689/90. And of our reign, the first year.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
